starts.title: Both players make silly faces at each other
Both players maintain 10 seconds of eye contact

examples.title: Both players share an embarrassing childhood story
examples.extra: Also, imitate how you acted in that story

examples.title: Both players admit a secret crush on someone in the room
examples.extra: Also, describe what you find attractive about them

examples.title: Both players maintain eye contact while making funny faces
examples.extra: Also, don't blink for 10 seconds

examples.title: Whisper an embarrassing secret to each other
examples.extra: Also, repeat it out loud for the group

examples.title: Hold hands awkwardly for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Also, interlock fingers and squeeze tightly

examples.title: Give each other awkward compliments
examples.extra: Make them overly dramatic and cheesy

examples.title: Dance badly together for one song
examples.extra: Also, try to mimic each other's worst moves

examples.title: Imitate each other's walk or mannerisms
examples.extra: Also, exaggerate them to be ridiculous

examples.title: Give each other a one finger shoulder massage
examples.extra: Only use your nose to do the massage

examples.title: Swap an item of clothing with each other
examples.extra: Also, wear it for the rest of the game

examples.title: Show each other an embarrassing photo on your phone
examples.extra: Also, set it as the other's wallpaper temporarily

examples.title: Sit so close that your legs are touching
examples.extra: Also, maintain that position for 5 minutes

examples.title: Both players imitate each other's laugh
examples.extra: Also, try to make it even more exaggerated

examples.title: Both players do the chicken dance together
examples.extra: Also, cluck like chickens throughout

examples.title: Both players attempt to do a coordinated dance move and fail
examples.extra: Also, laugh at each other's mistakes

examples.title: Both players try to speak in a foreign accent badly
examples.extra: Also, have a full conversation in the accent

examples.title: Both players make animal noises at each other
examples.extra: Also, act like the animal for 30 seconds

examples.title: Wear each other's shoes on the wrong feet
examples.extra: Also, walk around the room like that

examples.title: Sit on each other's laps and have a silly conversation
examples.extra: Also, use baby talk throughout

examples.title: Do a silly dance with exaggerated hip movements
examples.extra: Also, maintain eye contact while dancing

examples.title: Both players briefly pull up their shirts for the other to see
examples.extra: Both players flash the whole group

examples.title: Both players moon each other
examples.extra: Moon the whole group

examples.title: Current player will do an awkward lap dance for dare acceptor
examples.extra: Also, use a prop like a scarf or hat

examples.title: Both players flash their genitals to each other
examples.extra: Flash the whole group

examples.title: Both players streak naked to the front door and back quickly
examples.extra: Streak all the way to the mailbox and back

examples.title: From the knee, move your hand incrementally more intimate, asking "Nervous?" until they say yes.
examples.extra: Use your lips instead of your hand
